mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_rank_peace SET
data_league_rank_peace.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_rank_peace.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_league_rank_peace.ClubHistoryId = #{ clubHistoryId },
data_league_rank_peace.Points = #{ points },
data_league_rank_peace.DockOfCards = #{ dockOfCards },
data_league_rank_peace.DockOfFouls = #{ dockOfFouls },
data_league_rank_peace.DockOfSum = #{ dockOfSum },
data_league_rank_peace.RedCards = #{ redCards },
data_league_rank_peace.Year = #{ year },
data_league_rank_peace.EndYear = #{ endYear },
data_league_rank_peace.Fouls = #{ fouls },
data_league_rank_peace.YellowCards = #{ yellowCards },
data_league_rank_peace.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_rank_peace.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
